title: Reborn 80,000 Years - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Male Protagonist   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Overpowered Protagonist   Polygamy   Reincarnation   Schemes And Conspiracies   Tragic Past   Weak to Strong
author: 隔壁江叔叔
description: A generation of strong stars, Stardust, died at the hands of the villain and fell accidentally. When I woke up, I had been sleeping for 80,000 years. Things have changed. The four adopted sons have already become the strong men of the continent; a wild dog that has been saved has become the supreme demon king... that child, it is said 40,000 years ago, overcame common customs and became supreme! Observing the small sorrows of tens of thousands of years ago, one by one, Yang Chen feels that Yalishan is great! This is a little loaded.>
